STOPString001: {Section[STSPMainSectionName]}
STOPString008:
<!-- Title -->
<title>STSPPageTitle</title>

<!-- Required Meta Tags Always Come First -->
<meta charset="utf-8">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, shrink-to-fit=no">
<meta http-equiv="x-ua-compatible" content="IE=edge">

<!-- Favicon -->
<link rel="shortcut icon" href="/Unify263/assets/favicon.ico">

<!-- Google Fonts -->
<link href="//fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:300,400,600,700,800" rel="stylesheet">

<!-- CSS Global Compulsory -->
<link rel="stylesheet" href="/Unify263/assets/vendor/bootstrap/bootstrap.min.css">

<!-- CSS Implementing Plugins -->
<link rel="stylesheet" href="/Unify263/assets/vendor/icon-awesome/css/font-awesome.min.css">
<link rel="stylesheet" href="/Unify263/assets/vendor/icon-line/css/simple-line-icons.css">
<link rel="stylesheet" href="/Unify263/assets/vendor/icon-hs/style.css">
<link rel="stylesheet" href="/Unify263/assets/vendor/hamburgers/hamburgers.min.css">
<link rel="stylesheet" href="/Unify263/assets/vendor/animate.css">
<link rel="stylesheet" href="/Unify263/assets/vendor/dzsparallaxer/dzsparallaxer.css">
<link rel="stylesheet" href="/Unify263/assets/vendor/dzsparallaxer/dzsscroller/scroller.css">
<link rel="stylesheet" href="/Unify263/assets/vendor/dzsparallaxer/advancedscroller/plugin.css">
<link rel="stylesheet" href="/Unify263/assets/vendor/fancybox/jquery.fancybox.css">
<link rel="stylesheet" href="/Unify263/assets/vendor/cubeportfolio-full/cubeportfolio/css/cubeportfolio.min.css">
<link rel="stylesheet" href="/Unify263/assets/vendor/slick-carousel/slick/slick.css">

<!-- CSS Template -->
<link rel="stylesheet" href="/Unify263/one-pages/app/assets/css/styles.op-app.css">

<!-- CSS Customization -->
<link rel="stylesheet" href="/Unify263/assets/css/custom.css">
STOPString009:
<!-- JS Global Compulsory -->
<script src="/Unify263/assets/vendor/jquery/jquery.min.js"></script>
<script src="/Unify263/assets/vendor/jquery-migrate/jquery-migrate.min.js"></script>
<script src="/Unify263/assets/vendor/popper.js/popper.min.js"></script>
<script src="/Unify263/assets/vendor/bootstrap/bootstrap.min.js"></script>

<!-- JS Implementing Plugins -->
<script src="/Unify263/assets/vendor/appear.js"></script>
<script src="/Unify263/assets/vendor/dzsparallaxer/dzsparallaxer.js"></script>
<script src="/Unify263/assets/vendor/dzsparallaxer/dzsscroller/scroller.js"></script>
<script src="/Unify263/assets/vendor/dzsparallaxer/advancedscroller/plugin.js"></script>
<script src="/Unify263/assets/vendor/fancybox/jquery.fancybox.js"></script>
<script src="/Unify263/assets/vendor/cubeportfolio-full/cubeportfolio/js/jquery.cubeportfolio.min.js"></script>
<script src="/Unify263/assets/vendor/slick-carousel/slick/slick.js"></script>

<!-- JS Unify -->
<script src="/Unify263/assets/js/hs.core.js"></script>
<script src="/Unify263/assets/js/components/hs.header.js"></script>
<script src="/Unify263/assets/js/helpers/hs.hamburgers.js"></script>
<script src="/Unify263/assets/js/components/hs.scroll-nav.js"></script>
<script src="/Unify263/assets/js/components/hs.onscroll-animation.js"></script>
<script src="/Unify263/assets/js/components/hs.tabs.js"></script>
<script src="/Unify263/assets/js/components/hs.cubeportfolio.js"></script>
<script src="/Unify263/assets/js/components/hs.popup.js"></script>
<script src="/Unify263/assets/js/components/hs.carousel.js"></script>
<script src="/Unify263/assets/js/components/hs.go-to.js"></script>

<!-- JS Customization -->
<script src="/Unify263/assets/js/custom.js"></script>

<!-- JS Plugins Init. -->
<script>$(document).on('ready', function () {
    // initialization of carousel
    $.HSCore.components.HSCarousel.init('.js-carousel');

    // initialization of header
    $.HSCore.components.HSHeader.init($('#js-header'));
    $.HSCore.helpers.HSHamburgers.init('.hamburger');

    // initialization of tabs
    $.HSCore.components.HSTabs.init('[role="tablist"]');

    // initialization of scroll animation
    $.HSCore.components.HSOnScrollAnimation.init('[data-animation]');

    // initialization of go to section
    $.HSCore.components.HSGoTo.init('.js-go-to');

    // initialization of popups
    $.HSCore.components.HSPopup.init('.js-fancybox-media', {
        helpers: {
        media: {},
        overlay: {
            css: {
            'background': 'rgba(255, 255, 255, .8)'
            }
        }
        }
    });
    });

    $(window).on('load', function() {
    // initialization of HSScrollNav
    $.HSCore.components.HSScrollNav.init($('#js-scroll-nav'), {
        duration: 700
    });

    // initialization of cubeportfolio
    $.HSCore.components.HSCubeportfolio.init('.cbp');
    });

    $(window).on('resize', function () {
    setTimeout(function () {
        $.HSCore.components.HSTabs.init('[role="tablist"]');
    }, 200);
    });</script>
